item.title: Meta 修复了导致 Instagram 卷轴充斥暴力视频的错误
item.description: Meta Platforms 周四表示，它已经解决了一个错误，该错误导致全球 Instagram 用户的个人 Reels feed 频道充斥着暴力和图片视频。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Thursday it had resolved an error that flooded the personal Reels feeds of Instagram users with violent and graphic videos worldwide.】

item.title: Bath & Body Works 预测年度业绩因关税和消费担忧而不温不火
item.description: Bath & Body Works 周四预测全年销售额和利润低于预期，为美国对中国进口商品征收关税的影响以及消费者对其香水和香味蜡烛的消费疲软做准备。【原文：Bath & Body Works forecast annual sales and profit below expectations on Thursday, bracing for the impact of U.S. tariffs on Chinese imports as well as weak consumer spending on its fragrances and scented candles.】

item.title: 贸易战升级，经济学家押注中国的韧性
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税议程中，中国居于首位，国内经济学家预计，随着贸易战的加剧，政策措施、供应链调整和全球合作伙伴关系的加强将对世界第二大经济体起到缓冲作用。【原文：With China at the forefront of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff agenda, domestic economists expect a combination of policy measures, supply chain adjustments and strengthened global partnerships to cushion the world's second-largest economy as the trade war intensifies.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司预计到 2026 年流媒体部门的订户将达到 1.5 亿
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）周四表示，其流媒体服务到 2026 年将至少拥有 1.5 亿用户，此前 Max 的全球扩张推动了第四季度用户数量的增长，增幅超过预期。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery said on Thursday its streaming service will have at least 150 million users by 2026, after Max's global expansion powered stronger-than-expected subscriber gains in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 小米推出 15 Ultra 旗舰智能手机，售价 894 美元起
item.description: 全球第三大智能手机制造商小米公司周四发布了新款旗舰智能手机小米15 Ultra，基本型号起价6499元（894.19美元）。【原文：Xiaomi, the world's third-largest smartphone maker, launched its new flagship smartphone Xiaomi 15 Ultra on Thursday, with the base model starting at 6,499 yuan ($894.19).】

item.title: 加拿大道明银行受美国业务冲击，季度利润下降
item.description: 加拿大道明银行（TD Bank）周四公布第一季度利润下降，原因是其美国业务正在努力应对洗钱合规失败带来的影响。【原文：Canada's TD Bank reported a fall in first-quarter profit on Thursday as its U.S. business grapples with the fallout of money laundering compliance failures.】

item.title: 英伟达业绩缓解人工智能需求担忧，纳斯达克期货领涨
item.description: 美国股指期货周四上涨，原因是人工智能风向标英伟达（Nvidia）的乐观预测缓解了业界对需求降温的担忧，同时投资者也在评估特朗普政府最新威胁对全球贸易的影响。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Thursday as AI bellwether Nvidia's upbeat forecast soothed concerns of cooling demand in the industry, while investors gauged the implications of the Trump administration's latest threats on global trade.】

item.title: 渣打银行制定了详细的零净过渡计划
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered）周四披露了一项详细计划，概述了其将气候因素纳入业务运营的情况，目标是到 2050 年实现融资活动净零目标，到 2025 年实现业务运营净零目标。【原文：Standard Chartered on Thursday disclosed a detailed plan outlining its integration of climate considerations into its business operations, aiming for net zero targets across its financing activities by 2050 and its operations by 2025.】

item.title: 加拿大 RBC 季度利润增长，财富管理业务保持稳健
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行（Royal Bank of Canada）周四公布了第一季度利润增长报告，财富管理部门的强劲业绩为其带来了帮助。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada on Thursday reported a higher first-quarter profit, helped by strong performance in its wealth management unit.】

item.title: 早间竞价连英伟达都不看好，关税战迫在眉睫
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 亚马逊推出量子芯片，旨在缩短开发时间
item.description: 亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）周四展示了一款采用新技术的量子计算芯片，该公司希望通过这项新技术，将其制造商业上有用的量子计算机的努力缩短多达五年时间。【原文：Amazon Web Services on Thursday showed a quantum computing chip with new technology that it hopes will shave as much as five years off its effort to build a commercially useful quantum computer.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行因资本市场强劲而实现季度利润增长
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）周四公布第一季度利润增长，主要得益于其资本市场部门的强劲表现。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce reported a rise in first-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by strength in its capital markets unit.】

item.title: 腾讯发布全新人工智能模型，称回复速度超过 DeepSeek-R1
item.description: 中国科技巨头腾讯公司周四发布了一个新的人工智能模型，声称其回答查询的速度比全球热门的 DeepSeek-R1 更快，这是这家初创公司在国内外取得成功的最新迹象，也给其在中国的大型竞争对手带来了压力。【原文：Chinese tech giant Tencent on Thursday released a new AI model that it claims can answer queries faster than global hit DeepSeek-R1, in the latest sign the startup's domestic and overseas success is putting pressure on its larger competitors in China.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：微软将敦促特朗普全面限制人工智能芯片出口
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，微软将呼吁美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的团队放宽对数据中心可用于训练人工智能模型的芯片的限制，使其不再适用于一批美国盟友。【原文：Microsoft will call for U.S. President Donald Trump's team to ease the limits on chips that can be used in data centers for training AI models so they no longer apply to a group of U.S. allies, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 随着需求升温，巴西航空工业公司计划提高交付量
item.description: 巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周四表示，随着公司继续提高产量以满足强劲的需求，预计今年的飞机交付量将增加 18%，商用和公务机交付量将达到 240 架。【原文：Embraer expects to increase aircraft deliveries by up to 18% this year, it said on Thursday, reaching as many as 240 commercial and executive jets as it continues to lift output to meet strong demand.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，汇丰银行将中国平安部门的员工人数削减 900 人
item.description: 两位消息人士称，汇丰银行正在将其中国数字财富业务 "品智"（Pinnacle）的员工人数减少近一半，约为900人。【原文：HSBC is reducing staff numbers at its China digital wealth business Pinnacle by nearly half, or about 900 people, two sources said, a sharp reversal of the bank's ambition for the unit as part of its expansion plans in that country.】

item.title: 阿根廷纪念币丑闻削弱了米莱伊对选举盟友的追逐
item.description: 一桩纪念币丑闻和调查损害了阿根廷自由派总统哈维尔-米莱伊的声望，阻碍了他在今年国会中期选举前加强政治联盟的努力。【原文：A meme coin scandal and investigation have dented the popularity of Argentina's libertarian President Javier Milei and hindered his efforts to strengthen political alliances ahead of congressional midterm elections this year.】

item.title: 英伟达股价下跌，因业绩预测未能平息超支担忧
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）的股价周四走低，原因是这家人工智能风向标公司乐观的季度预测未能缓解业界过度消费的紧张情绪。【原文：Nvidia's shares ticked lower on Thursday as the AI bellwether's upbeat quarterly forecast failed to ease nerves around overspending in the industry.】

item.title: 意大利商业游说团称特朗普关税政策是对欧盟工业和就业的攻击
item.description: 意大利商业游说团体周三晚些时候表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对欧盟进口商品征收关税，这将损害该集团的企业和劳动力，需要欧盟做出强有力的回应。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's threat to introduce tariffs on European Union imports would undermine the bloc's companies and its workforce and require a strong response from the EU, Italy's business lobby said late on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本制造业工会成员要求在 2025 年实现创纪录的加薪
item.description: 代表主要制造商的一个日本工会组织周四表示，在生活成本不断上涨的情况下，其成员要求在去年的基础上，将今年的基本工资提高到创纪录的水平。【原文：A Japanese labour union group representing major manufacturers said on Thursday its members are demanding a record increase in their base pay for this year, building on last year's momentum amid rising living costs.】

item.title: 中国鼓励银行向钢铁等行业提供更多金融支持
item.description: 中国金融监管机构鼓励银行和保险公司加强对钢铁、有色金属和石化等行业技术创新和设备升级的中长期贷款支持。【原文：China's financial regulator encouraged banks and insurers to enhance medium-to-long-term lending support for technology innovation and equipment upgrades in sectors including steel, nonferrous metals and petrochemicals.】

item.title: 对冲基金押注不被看好的中国房地产业将迎来转机
item.description: 一些大型对冲基金和投资者正在以低价积累长期避开的中国房地产股票，期待该行业从长期危机中复苏后获得丰厚回报。【原文：Some large hedge funds and investors are accumulating long-shunned China property stocks at low prices, anticipating lucrative returns when the sector recovers from its prolonged crisis.】

item.title: Ocado 表示有望在 2026 年实现正现金流
item.description: 英国网上超市和技术集团 Ocado 公布的年度亏损额较小，并表示有望在 2025-26 年实现现金流转正的关键目标。【原文：Ocado , the British online supermarket and technology group, reported a smaller annual loss and said it was on track to hit its key target of turning cash flow positive in its 2025-26 year.】

item.title: 独家报道泰国官员称将权衡汽车以旧换新计划以振兴汽车行业
item.description: 三位行业官员和两位消息人士称，泰国正在与汽车制造商进行早期讨论，以引入汽车以旧换新和报废计划，从而重振遭受数十年来最大危机打击的汽车行业。【原文：Thailand is in early discussions with car makers to introduce a car trade-in and scrapping scheme in a bid to revive an industry hit by its biggest crisis in decades, three industry officials and two sources said.】

item.title: 特朗普新关税激起针对中国钢铁的贸易摩擦浪潮
item.description: 中国巨大的钢铁行业今年正面临着越来越大的出口压力。【原文：China's giant steel industry is facing mounting pressure on exports this year.】

item.title: 特朗普钢铁关税危及中国钢铁转运贸易
item.description: 美国新的钢铁关税将扰乱价值数十亿美元的供应链，使钢铁从中国经由第三国运往美国，从而加剧全球市场的竞争，并削弱中国陷入困境的钢铁行业的一个重要销售来源。【原文：New U.S. steel tariffs are set to disrupt a multi-billion dollar supply chain moving steel from China to the United States via third countries, ratcheting up competition in the global market and undercutting a vital source of sales for China's struggling steel sector.】

item.title: 中国百度与 CATL 将联合开发 "有竞争力的 "无人驾驶汽车
item.description: 中国百度和电动汽车电池巨头 CATL 周四表示，双方将共同探索开发 "具有竞争力 "的无人驾驶汽车和创新商业模式。【原文：China's Baidu and electric vehicle battery giant CATL will jointly explore the development of "competitive" driverless vehicles and innovative business models, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 随着微软产品推广步伐加快，LSEG 预计 2025 年盈利能力将有所提高
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（London Stock Exchange Group）周四提出了 2025 年继续增长和提高盈利能力的指导意见，并表示将通过强大的创新渠道来增强其 Workspace 产品并提高年度订阅价值。【原文：London Stock Exchange Group gave guidance on Thursday for continued growth and improving profitability in 2025, citing a strong pipeline of innovations to enhance its Workspace product and boost annual subscription values.】

item.title: 武契奇总统表示美国暂时中止对塞尔维亚石油公司的制裁
item.description: 塞尔维亚总统亚历山大-武契奇（Aleksandar Vucic）周四表示，美国已暂停对塞尔维亚石油公司（NIS）实施为期30天的制裁。【原文：The United States has suspended sanctions for 30 days on Serbian oil company NIS, which is majority owned by Russian companies, President Aleksandar Vucic said on Thursday.】

item.title: 英国劳斯莱斯公司上调 2024 年业绩预期
item.description: 英国罗尔斯-罗伊斯公司上调了中期目标，以反映对未来利润增长的信心，因为该公司提高发动机性能和降低成本的计划取得了进展，帮助其去年的业绩超过了预期。【原文：Britain's Rolls-Royce lifted its mid-term targets to reflect confidence in future profit growth as its plan to improve engine performance and lower costs gains traction, helping it beat expectations last year.】
